attributes.action: Look again at the special needs provisons across the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: SEN across the country is hit and miss at best and non existant at worse, now is the time to listen to the parents with regard to their childrens needs and provide the same support everywhere. We are fed up with the postcode lottery that is SEN provision today. Children Have Only 1 Choice in Education!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
